renteria signing a top - shelf deal red sox general manager theo epstein acknowledged edgar renteria was more a luxury for the red red sox than a necessity. but there's nothing wrong with getting the keys to a bmw, and that's what a four time - all - star and two - time gold glover is in the eyes of the red sox.

saban not going to dolphins yet the miami dolphins will put their courtship of fbi coach nick saban on hold to comply with the nfl's hiring policy, interviewing at least one minority personnel, a team source and the associated press last night.
